title: New: Ardyn – Over The River
body:
London duo **Ardyn** have just released their intoxicating new track, Over The River.

Their first new material of 2016, it’s London Grammar-esque perfectly crafted pop – elegant and slickly produced. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
